title: Free skin for not being chat banned
body: I think this is an awesome idea. I heard that any skin could be in it. If I get Pax TF I swear I will make a pilgrimage once a year to Riot HQ and bow on their front lawn and weep over the luck I have been bestowed. Anyone here hoping for a particular skin?

replies.body:
From the Mystery Gift FAQ:

*A skin for any Champion that your friend owns is eligible for Mystery Gifting, as long as it's worth at least 520 RP and is available in the store. This includes Legendary and even Ultimate skins! Legacy skins will also be obtainable as a Mystery Skin **EXCEPT** Achievement skins, Collector's Edition skins, PAX skins, Rusty Blitzcrank, Urf the Manatee, Championship Riven and Riot Squad Singed.*

Sorry. D:
If you got chat banned in 2015 will you still receive the gift?

They said you have to have at least ten skins you don't own. Who knows, you might get TEN free skins! j/k lol

I bought rocket girl Tristana before they announced her VU and changed her splash art and I'm so insanely torn right now...)
